name: Titlebar Effect
author: Jagruti R.

sections.description:
Plugin for animating titlebar text. This will use to get your users’ attention when they open a new tab in the browser.

  • This plugin will automatically add titlebar effect in your website once you install and activate it.
  • It takes less space in your server.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

Download this free WordPress.org PlugIn, and

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
